name: WHO'S YOUR DADDY PE !
description:
WHO'S YOUR DADDY PE ! is a casual 1 on 1 video game featuring a clueless father attempting to prevent his infant son from certain death.
WHO'S YOUR DADDY PE ! features two different characters to play as, the daddy and the baby.
Choose a role and win the game! If you are the daddy then your task is not to let the baby die before the time runs out! Watch out for a lot of dangerous things in the house! If you are the baby then your task is to injure yourself before the time runs out.
